00051 class CSwordBackend : public SWMgr {
00052 public:
00057   enum FilterOptions {
00058     footnotes,
00059     strongNumbers,
00060     headings,
00061     morphTags,
00062         lemmas,
00063         hebrewPoints,
00064         hebrewCantillation,
00065         greekAccents,
00066     scriptureReferences,        
00067     textualVariants,

00069         filterOptionsMAX = textualVariants
00070     };
00071 
00072   struct FilterOptionsBool {
00073     bool footnotes;
00074     bool strongNumbers;
00075     bool headings;
00076     bool morphTags;
00077         bool lemmas;
00078         bool hebrewPoints;
00079         bool hebrewCantillation;
00080         bool greekAccents;
00081         bool textualVariants;
00082     bool scriptureReferences;
00083     };
00084     struct DisplayOptionsBool {
00085         bool lineBreaks;
00086         bool verseNumbers;
00087     };
00088   enum LoadError { // the values exist to cast from the char return of SWMgr::Load
00089         NoSwordConfig = -1,
00090         NoError = 0,
00091         NoModules = 1
00092   };
00098     CSwordBackend();
